titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the child tax credit with respect to stillbirths.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the child tax credit with respect to stillbirths.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill allows the child tax credit to be used for stillbirths. A stillbirth is delivery after the involuntary death of an unborn child who was carried in the womb for 20 weeks or more.
